entities.name: master sirius
entities.description: Master Sirius is described as a bad boy who broke his Mistress's heart with his lawless ways.

entities.name: master regulus
entities.description: Master Regulus is described as having proper order and knowing what was due to the name of Black and the dignity of his pure blood.

entities.name: kraucher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who is liked by Master Regulus.

entities.name: the dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is described as someone who was going to bring the wizards out of hiding to rule the Muggles and the Muggleborns.

entities.name: mister black
entities.description: Mistress's husband, Master Black, is mentioned as having pure blood.

relationships.description: Master Regulus joined the Dark Lord.
Kreacher was liked by Master Regulus.
